news_header: Finnish banking services and identifiers are crucial for national security, according to Antti Lindtman, chairman of the Banking Authority.
news_text: Antti Lindtman, chairman of the Finnish Banking Authority, emphasizes that banking services and identifiers are essential for Finland's national security. The authority has requested an investigation into ongoing issues with Nordea's online banking services, which have persisted for weeks due to denial-of-service attacks and technical changes. The Banking Authority seeks to understand how the situation has been addressed and whether all necessary measures have been taken to restore services for Finnish citizens. A meeting is scheduled for next week, where the authority will hear a report and decide on further actions. Additionally, the parliamentary finance committee will hold a hearing on online banking outages, involving both authorities and Nordea representatives.
